## TestSandbox.mkdir() method

Makes a directory in the TestSandbox

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mkdir(dir: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dir | <code>string</code> | Name of directory to create (relative to TestSandbox path) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
